title: Tab Muter
content: There is a little speaker icon on my tab recently, its annoyingly in my way I don't need it. How do I disable the Tab Muter thing, I dont like it, want it gone. Why would anyone need a tab muter when you can simply mute the video you are watching? Its just another thing that makes no sense. I have a MacBook- OS High Sierra. FireFox v113.0.1.. Thanks.
creator: sunnyskyez

title: Kirjanmerkki luettelo windows 11
content: Kirjanmerkki luettelo näytön sivusta katosi (windows 11). Kuinka saan sen palautettua? Kirjanmerkit ovat edelleen olemassa, saan niitä yksitellen poimittua 'ylärivin' avulla Sovellusvalikon kirjamerkit kohdasta olen kokeillut kirjamerkkipalkki-painiketta, se antaa vain näytö yläreunaan 'jotakin'. Haluaisin listan muodossa näytön vasempaan reunaan kuten aikaisemminkin oli ennen katoamistaan. Olisiko joku Firefox päivitys sen syönyt?
creator: Apande

title: Edit and resend functions unrecognizable characters using Chinese as a parameter
content: Edit and resend using Chinese as a parameter leads to sending out unrecognized characters.

title: Riproduzione dei video
content:
Allora: il problema che ho riscontrato è sorto da un giorno all'altro. La sera prima tutto funzionava bene, il giorno dopo ecco presentarsi questo fastidioso problema.

In pratica firefox non visualizza/riproduce più alcun video. Allego alcune immagini da youtube ma è la stessa cosa per vimeo, amazon prime video, twitch, gazzetta.it, corriere.it, etc... etc...

Come potete vedere dalle immagini, appena si cerca di riprodurre il video non si vede nulla, tutto nero il player. Ho pensato subito ad un problema legato ad un plugin (anche se la cosa mi sembrava strana).

Ho riavviato il browser in modalità di risoluzione problemi ed effettivamente il problema riscontrato non si verificava. A questo punto, convinto stavolta che il problema fosse legato ad un plugin ho disinstallato ad uno ad uno i plugin e riprovato ma niente: il problema era sempre lì.

Ho fatto allora il ripristino di firefox: risultato identico, il problema non era risolto. Mi sono deciso a disinstallare firefox, ho pulito tutti i file collegati rimasti (compresi quelli nella cartella %appdata%) ed ho effettuato una nuova installazione e non ho scaricato nulla (nè estensioni, nè temi, nè plugin). Risultato? Non ho risolto nulla. In modalità risoluzione dei problemi però continua a non presentarsi. Francamente non so più cosa pensare. Devo trovare una soluzione oppure mi tocca utilizzare necessariamente un altro browser.

Per complezza ecco i plugin che erano installati: 600% Sound Volume; Absolute Enable Righ Click & Copy; Bitwarden - Gestore di Password Gratuito; Cookie AutoDelete; Firefox Relay; I don't care about cookies; Keepa - Amazon Price Tracker; Livemarks; OneTab.
creator: markopompeo

title: Keep getting error response when trying to sign in to my on line bank account
content:
I have always been able to sign in to my Halifax Bank on line account using a stored bookmark. However since the last system update, every time I try to log in I get an error response.... Sorry, we've had to sign you out [Error: 1007 ID: 18.653a5b68.1684056876.8f1ccef]

I have contacted the bank and they say that it is an error from my Firefox Browser, that many other users are reporting.

I can access my account via Chrome. Can you advise me of the solution so that I can access my account via Firefox.

Thank you
creator: mwickings

title: How to ensure size & shape of page remains the same from session to session
content:
Is there a way to ensure size & shape of page remains the same from session to session? I use my TV as a monitor and every time I open Firefox I have to manually reshape the browser to fit the screen. I'd love for it to come up the same each time.

Thanks, Richard
creator: r.e.scott47

title: changes to bookmarks menus and how they are viewed
content: I am very upset that the bookmarks icon changed an now I cannot get a listing of my hundreds of bookmarks and other bookmarks. Yeah, I can hit "edit bookmarks" and that will produce the complete listings. However, all I want and need to do is click on the bookmark and go. Why was this changed? This is NOT an improvement. Please restore the use of the prior bookmark icons and make life simpler. Thank you.
creator: svetanoff1

title: Bookmarks and AddOns gone
content:
Hi,

I just brought a 3070... played with it and 2 days later (today) i was watching a movie and the screen turned black. Reinstalled windows, because it keeped happening.... found it that it seems to be the GPU died after 4 days for no reason at all (so i'm not in the best mood right now).

After reinstalling windows and installing firefox i notced that my bookmarks from my profile are gone and no matter what i do they seem to be gone.

This is really confusing to me, because last time i had to reinstall windows firefox loaded my bookmarks and even autoinstalled the addons that i had "in my account".


What happened? Why is everything gone? Not only did by new GPU chose to die on a saturday night... i just also seem to have lost my bookmarks of the last 8 years (some of them i do really need).

At first i thought that i have to select something to import the bookmarks, but since even my addons are gone i wonder where it all went.
creator: Wing84
